'[[Football (soccer)|Football]] at the [[1928 Summer Olympics]]' tournament, won
by Uruguay against Argentina, would be the precursor to the first FIFA World Cup
held in 1930 in Uruguay.
categories: International association football competitions hosted by the Netherlands|1928
